Dear Mr. Sandler:
As you may know, Freshman Congressman Jerry Pettis and
Howard Pollock were elected by the 59 new Republican
Congressmen to represent them on the Republican Congressional
Policy Committee.
These very competent Congressmen have been featured by
several Washington groups and in several publications, in¬
cluding Capitol Hill Roll Call, the Republican Congressional
Committee Newsletter. Congressman Pettis has been the sub¬
ject of Republican National Committee releases and he and
Pollock are being featured in the next issue of Nation's
Business.
It occurs to me that these men might be useful in
developing an informative program on the new nNER Washington
Forum" series.
Please let me know if we may be helpful in this matter.
